review: I haven't had a chance to use it very much yet, but it was so easy to set up that I did it without any help from my husband.  I also downloaded the remote control app to my phone very quickly and easily.  I especially enjoyed the voice feature on the phone app for searching for titles--so much easier and quicker than having to type!  We have Apple TV in our living room which we enjoy very much, but the Apple remote is really a little too small and slender for my taste.  I like the size and configuration of the Amazon remote better.  Also, the Amazon TV stick was less than half the price of the Apple TV, which is the main reason I bought it. I was happy to see that I can watch Season 2 of Extant for free since I have Amazon Prime.  Overall, I am very pleased with my Amazon Fire TV Stick.
author: Jan in Texas

review: The remote started acting up the first day, and now it is dead.  Without the remote, the thing is useless.

review: For the price, I would give it 5 star.  For the quality, I would give it 4 star. So the average is 4 star.  The wifi got disconnected easily.

author: Amazon Customer

review: After the recent updates, I like it almost as much as our Roku 3. Plenty of apps to choose from and it's easy to use. We have this in our guest room instead of paying for an additional cable box. Hulu plus is the best app, well worth the $8 of month. Easy to use, especially since our TV has both a HDMI port and a USB port. So we just keep the Stick connected to the TV's USB port so that we don't have to plug it in an outlet.
